posts.headline: Reusable Parallax Effect With CSS Variables
posts.text: CSS variables offers us a very neat way to share information between CSS and JavaScript. The perk of connecting these two with CSS variables is that we can access them and modify them in CSS and in JS at any time.

posts.headline: Custom double range slider
posts.text: o create our custom slider we will make use of the native input type range, well, two of them. The idea in a nutshell is to hide the inputs and set / update visually our custom slider based on the values of those inputs.
